hero.title: Trusted Digital Certification
hero.subtitle: Verifiable Quality Certificates for Agricultural Exports
hero.text: AgroTrace transforms agricultural quality assurance with W3C-compliant Digital Product Passports. Secure, verifiable, and instantly accessible certification for global trade

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for seamless agricultural export certification
features.w3cDesc: Industry-standard digital credentials with cryptographic verification and global interoperability
features.blockchainDesc: Tamper-proof certificate verification with immutable transaction records on blockchain
features.qrDesc: Instant certificate validation through mobile QR scanning with offline capability
features.multiStakeholderDesc: Dedicated dashboards for exporters, QA agencies, and importers with role-based access
features.digitalWalletDesc: Import credentials into Inji wallet for portable, self-sovereign identity management
features.auditTrailDesc: Full transparency with timestamped records of all certification and verification activities

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, transparent process from batch submission to verification
howItWorks.description: Our platform streamlines the entire quality certification workflow with blockchain-verified credentials
howItWorks.step1Desc: Exporters submit batch details, documentation, and request quality inspection
howItWorks.step2Desc: Certified agencies conduct thorough inspection and testing with detailed reporting
howItWorks.step3Desc: W3C Verifiable Credentials generated and anchored to blockchain with unique QR codes
howItWorks.step4Desc: Anyone can verify authenticity by scanning QR code or entering batch tracking token

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Certification Process?
cta.subtitle: Join leading agricultural exporters using blockchain-verified W3C credentials for trusted quality assurance

footer.description: Blockchain-verified W3C Verifiable Credentials for agricultural export quality certification
